titleStmt.title: Part of Lucian made English from the originall, in the yeare 1638 by Jasper Mayne ..., to which are adjoyned those other dialogues of Lucian as they were formerly translated by Mr. Francis Hicks.
titleStmt.author: Lucian, of Samosata.
Mayne, Jasper, 1604-1672.
Hickes, Francis, 1566-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall for R. Davis,

notesStmt.note: The epistle dedicatory signed by Jasper Mayne.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
